preference.name: IMM_CAD_CATALOGS_ALLOWED_FOR_SEARCH
preference.preference_description: Specifies the valid catalog entries and their formats to use when searching for materials: *CatalogName(CatalogUID): To use the last catalog revision. *CatalogName(CatalogRevisionUID): To use the specified catalog revision. *database(-): To search the entire database for materials. *any: To search for materials in any catalog defined in this list. If you do not specify a value for this preference, all the catalogs to which the user has access will be displayed. The first entry in the list is the default one selected on the UI.
